Title: Kill the Boy
Writer: George R.R. Martin (based on "A Song of Ice and Fire" by), David Benioff (created by), D.B. Weiss (created by), Bryan Cogman (written for television by)
Actors: Peter Dinklage, Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington, Stephen Dillane
Plot: Daenerys arrests the heads of Meereen's great families. Jon makes a difficult decision. Theon is forced to face Sansa. Stannis rides south. Tyrion and Jorah enter the ruins of Old Valyria.
